"Xiera": "Hello! This is the [Ranger Basics] training course!"
"Let's start off by learning about <red>Just Attacks<c>!"
"A red circle appears after using normal attacks and Photon Arts. Just Attack means <red>timing your attack<c> to that circle!"
"Use a normal attack, and time a Photon Art to the red circle that follows!"

"・Use a normal attack with <%NormalAttack>
・When you see the red circle,
use a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>."

"・Use a normal attack with <%NormalAttack>
・When you see the red circle,
use a Photon Art with <%PhotonArts>."

"\"Just Attacks\" deal more damage than normal.

By pressing the attack button when you see the red circle, your attack becomes a Just Attack.

※This also applies to Photon Arts and Techniques

※Pet attacks cannot be Just Attacks."
